column4: can someone help please, my ubuntu keeps crashing, i thikn its X related, something about ati cards not liking 3d acceleratgion or something
hey folks, this is my first time on #ubuntu, help a noob out please, just give me some pointers ill do the rest, comp frezes over and over
no idea, but I've heard that from a few people
yea people with ati cards have this prob and i saw a wiki page showing how to fix it by disabling 2d and 3d acceleration but now i dunno how to find that page again :(
